questList.questDescription: The Veins of Inferno demand a tribute. A binding ritual must be conducted or the life of a mighty creature taken to soothe the anger of the molten scars. Tread carefully and make your choice.

Earn an alliance with one of the more adherent beings dwelling amidst the scorching chaos. Within the thickets of mists lurks strengths fiery and fervent ready to offer aid if approached with respect.
Hunt down one of the fiends casting shadows of carnage throughout fiery convulsions. Doing so engrains stronger relics from honored confinements toward future struggles.
Whispering shadows haunt every corner of the marsh. Strike an allyship with the lurking entities or eliminate those stumbling with discontent to pass untroubled through Gloaming Marsh.
